definition: to take care of (sb's health)/to nurse
food therapy/treatment via food (TCM)
to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
tonic food (food considered to be particularly healthful)/to eat such foods
correct diagnosis/to prescribe the right cure for an illness/to suit the medicine to the illness
to expel poison (from the system)/to detox
to course the liver and rectify 氣|气[qi4] (TCM)
diagnosis and treatment based on an overall analysis of the illness and the patient's condition
moxibustion (TCM)
to treat (an illness)/medical treatment/therapy
disease/illness
qi and blood (two basic bodily fluids of Chinese medicine)
traditional Chinese medical science/a doctor trained in Chinese medicine
to take medicine orally (as opposed to applying externally)
(traditional) Chinese medicine/CL:服[fu4],種|种[zhong3]
to dispel/to clear
